categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Phoenix Squadron was a Rebel Alliance starfighter squadron consisting of B-wing starfighters. They were part of a failed attempt to destroy the Immobilizer 418 cruiser Compellor. Their role was to attempt to destroy the Compellor by disabling her weapon systems with mag pulse warheads, then attack with volley of proton torpedos. Viper Squadron provided starfighter cover for Phoenix Squadron during the attack on the Compellor. Unfortunately for the Alliance, both squadrons were lost in the engagement.
